message.body: John said he's going back tomorrow so he'll probably go out today. Idk what time yet.
I told him to let me know before I leave work at 5
So he'll either be ready at 5 or later.
It's going to be a surprise so if you want to go out you just stand by
Hope you're having fun in your first day!!!
Thanks. I'm just reading up on the various projects I'll be working on.
Well I'm planning to jump in the shower now. If he's planning on five or later, you can come here if you want to chill out (with coffee) and we could always meet him when he's ready.
I'm gonna be meeting him and probably going home after not too long. Idk if you'll be out in time. If not see if he wants to do something after
In that case, I'm probably not going to be meeting up with you guys today. Hope you have fun!
